short_summary: Proposal for Ongoing Commissioning (OCx) in the federal building portfolio (Building maintenance service: Union or association)
description: The procurement of Ongoing Commissioning (OCx Provider - GGF Smart Building) aims to accelerate the adoption of Ongoing Commissioning (OCx) in the entire federal building portfolio as a key strategy for reaching and maintaining the GHG emission reduction targets set by the GGS.  The proposal will involve providing building maintenance services, including inspection services, for the entire portfolio. It is expected that the contract will have the duration of 2 years and 6 months. The specific services requested in this procurement are building maintenance services, Building inspection services. The contract will be awarded based on the combined technical merit and the price of the proposal. The procurement is subject to the terms and conditions of the contract between Ressources Naturelles Canada and the GGG.",

## Procurement Details

* Procurement Method: Competitive Open Tendering
* Noticetype: Invitation for Proposal
* Selection Criteria: Highest Combined Score of Technical Merit and Price

## Service Description

The Government of Canada is seeking a qualified provider to help accelerate the adoption of Ongoing Commissioning (OCx) in its federal building portfolio. This service is key to achieving and maintaining greenhouse gas (GHG) emission reduction targets set by the Government of Canada. 

### Important Considerations

* Bidders must recognize the security requirements associated with this requirement. Please consult Part 6 of the RFP for more information.
* Security personnel and organization screening details can be found on the Public Website of government Services Canada.
